content:
Hello! I am currently working on PR #8061 and was discussing with @Akash Nimare about where to put a setting for changing the notification sound. In my work so far I've put it here (circled for emphasis): notification sound placement. It's inside the Notifications tab above the other, scenario-specific settings (because it didn't seem applicable there).

Please let me know if there would be a better location for this setting.
It seems to me fine at the moment.
@skunkmb (Marco Burstein) that looks pretty good to me! :)
